page.title: 19SCHOOL
page.content: There are two teachers in our school and thirty five children The headteacher who is our teacher is called Mrs Dutton. She brngs in her puppy, who is called Kim, every week day. Our first interval is from 10.45am. to 11.15am. while our lunch lasts an hour from 12.30 to 1.30pm. After lunch we do a little bit of work e.g. crossword or dictionary and the teacher tells us our homework. On Tuesday mornings we have art with our art teacher Mr Dunn. Unfortunately we do not get him every term. On Tuesday afternoons we go to sewing which the boys do not like. On Friday after dinner we get Mr Burgess our music teacher. School ends at 2.30pm. The mini bus will pick up the first lot of children, then it will come back for the second lot of children to take home.
